item.title: In Memoriam: Derek Miller
item.description: Much-loved Vancouver writer Derek Miller passed away yesterday at the age of 41. He had struggled with cancer for the past few years. I interviewed Derek for a Print Futures assignment a while back and wrote an article about his writing career. In the interview, Derek told me that he didn’t know what the future would hold, but he knew for sure he would still be writing. He was right.
